title: HOUR 2 - Tory Holt, Steph Curry
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Tory Holt, Steph Curry
description:
In hour 2, Former Rams receiver Tory Holt joins to talk about his time in St.Louis as well as how the LA Rams have run their organization. He also give his thoughts on how the younger receivers in Green Bay may be handling the challenge of Aaron Rodgers expectations. Colin also makes his argument of why Steph Curry is amongst the all-time elite NBA talent.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
